alert.note: Alert for Hennepin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 10:32PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Hennepin County through 1045 PM CDT... At 1032 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Medina, or 15 miles northwest of Minneapolis, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Plymouth, Maple Grove and Corcoran around 1045 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
